datoCmsKey.bio: Contemporary stage actor for over 12 years and percussionist (8+ years). Graduate of CSU Long Beach and current student of Now>Ever Artists in Los Angeles (instr. Rain Valdez). Specializations in stage combat, directing, stage makeup, company management, and collaborations.  Looking to expand in devised works, playwrighting, & visual editing. Type 1 Diabetic. Foster parent
